item.title: Epidemic situation in Egypt
item.description: --- title: Epidemic situation in Egypt author: Ying Zou date: '2020-09-04' slug: epidemic-situation-in-egypt categories: [] tags: [] --- The overseas epidemic situation is getting worse. In this blog, I will make some simple data analysis on the world epidemic situation and the epidemic situation in Egypt. Egypt sees marked decline in daily COVID-19 infections, China and Egypt have been in close contact with each other to fight the epidemic and jointly develop new vaccines.
